title: Minecraft: Pocket Edition v0.11.1 Android
description:
Minecraft: Pocket Edition v0.11.1
Requirements: Compatible with iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad. Requires iOS 5.1.1 or later
Overview: Play the biggest update to Minecraft: Pocket Edition so far! ItÃƒÂ¢Ã‚â‚¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s the overhaul of a generation. Download it now and see for yourself!
Minecraft is a game about placing blocks and going on adventures.

Pocket Edition includes Survival and Creative modes, multiplayer over a local Wi-Fi network, infinite worlds, caves, biomes, mobs, villages, custom skins, fishing, boats, and lots more. Craft, create and explore anywhere in the world so long as you have hands spare and battery to burn.

ThereÃƒÂ¢Ã‚â‚¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s never been a better time to enjoy Minecraft on the move.
